Name: Everyone's Happy Place
About the game: Experience the challenges of being homeless, but now with a new job. Go out there and explore the world of EHP! EHP is a single player money game where you have just got kicked out of the house and now you have to get yourself back on your feet with a starting Â£2000 and a new job opportunity. Explore the world with vehicles and admire the colourful atmosphere. Stay on it for a long time to grind out as much money as possible. Features Rise up to the top The scoreboard which displays the top 10 most rich players in the game rise to the top and be the best. So go out there and explore the world of EHP. Explore Drive round and explore the landscape of EHP. Arcade Go to the arcade to play some fun minigames. Car's Drive around with cars that can be purchased in the shop
